messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm missing message being on digest
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/27/02 3:32:49 PM, savagewilson@springmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/27/02 3:32:49 PM, savagewilson@... writes:

<< Anyway I realized this after I got the last two digests and didn't
recognize
half of the conversations. Guess I'll have to start going to the webpage. >>

I just get e-mails. That way I don't get the advertising pages at the
website, and I can delete threads I know I don't want to read.

Sandra

messages.subject: I'm missing message being on digest
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Is anyone else missing like half the messages by getting this list in digest form?  Also words with arrows or brackets around them don t come through
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Is anyone else missing like half the messages by getting this list in digest
form? Also words with arrows or brackets around them don't come through in
digest form. For instances I couldn't see the *grin* on your post Sandra
after you said your were a Leo, if I had it would have read differently to me.
Anyway I realized this after I got the last two digests and didn't recognize
half of the conversations. Guess I'll have to start going to the webpage.

Cherry in GA
